attributes.action: Classify laser devices as an offensive weapon when pointed at aircraft.
attributes.additional_details:
Lasers pointing devices that cause pilots to take evasive action to protect themselves, the crew & passengers as well as the public below the aircraft, should be classed as an offensive weapon.

It is well documented in the media, most recently http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-35580261 when a laser pointer is used beyond its normal & intended use as a pointing device, it should carry the same classification as a firearm.
attributes.background: Laser pointing devices should be classified as an offensive weapon when used and pointed at aircraft that disrupts the flight or distracts the pilot.
